website_summaries.verdict: Though the results are mixed, this toothpaste has gained many satisfied users for its flavor and whitening results.
pros: Contains baking soda that helps boosts its cleaning abilities and natural peppermint oil for fresher breath
Some users brag about seeing results in as little as three days
cons: Doesn't produce much in the way of suds or bubbles
A few reports of slightly irritated gums after use

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I'm a walking billboard now
customer_reviews.text: So I originally bought this after I had a 5 year old told me how yellow my teeth were.... I'm a heavy smoker but I brushed my teeth every day with that Crest whitening toothpaste. I knew my teeth weren't a perfect white but I knew they weren't some ugly shade of yellow. So as an impulse buy I bought some charcoal toothpaste... I took my before photos, eagerly waiting for that perfect white smile. I didn't see results after a few days, or a week as some reviews have claimed. It was almost 3 months before I noticed that nice dental commercial white. So I finally took my after photo today.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Y'all I had no faith in this so I did ...
customer_reviews.text: Y'all I had no faith in this so I did not take a before picture but I am so thrilled with the results! Someone at work even asked me about my new whiter teeth
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: If I could give more stars, I would! I've looked at this product several times thinking it was way too good to be true, but thought I'd give it a try, and WOW. this is after just 3 days!!! And the best part is NO sensitivity, way cheaper than whitening strips or trays, and it is so quick and easy; I'm not doing anything different in my normal routine, just brushing with a different toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how fast this worked and clean my teeth feel. I will say you should use a soft toothbrush and gently brush your teeth, and not use your electronic one. I noticed my gums were sore when I used my electric toothbrush and when I made the switch it felt better.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Driggers

customer_reviews.title: Beyond fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste really made the difference!!! My teeth went to yellowish tone to pretty white by the 7th day. And by the end of the second week they look even brighter than I consider possible. I can't stop smiling!!! Also, it is very nice that it vanishes bad breath. I mean, it just goes away. The minty sensation is good and stays for a while , but even after that wears off, I can still feel my mouth is nice and clean. Totally recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Camila P.

customer_reviews.title: Whiter teeth!
customer_reviews.text: Saw results after only a few days. I've tried over the counter whitening gels and they were time consuming and very painful. I Love this toothpaste! It's all natural and its tastes minty and fresh. Only complaint is that it's kinda messy...but easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt M. Shea

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I been using this product for about a week now and have noticed a difference. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy DeRosa

customer_reviews.title: A TUBE HALF FULL OF A VILE PASTE THAT DOESN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: It is not advertised that the first ingredient is ground diatomaceous earths. Gardeners use this as a barrier against snails, whose flesh is cut and torn by diatomaceous earths, just as your gums will be. Second, forget "mint;" this toothpaste tastes so vilely bitter I couldn't tolerate it without adding in a regular toothpaste. Next, THE TUBE CAME BARELY HALF FULL, which is a terrible rip-off. It's also extremely difficult to squeeze out the paste. The final insult? It simply doesn't work--at all-- to change the color of the teeth. Caveat emptor.
customer_reviews.author: KnitWit

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product; works as expected; welcomed change to traditional toothpaste
customer_reviews.author: MIKE R.

customer_reviews.title: Instant results
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this toothpaste for a week now and I must say it’s pretty amazing! My breath is fresh and my teeth are getting noticeably whiter after just a week! It’s worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Marin Moon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Noticed the whitening of my teeth with the very first use. Will definitely purchase again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Ariel

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I regret buy this. I used it for a week. It began to burn my gums. Now they are tender and its painful to brush them. I am a freak with my oral hygiene and i hate that i made this choice.
customer_reviews.author: anna garcia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was really hoping this would work but I don’t see a change in the color of my teeth
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Caused burning and scratching of my mouth!
customer_reviews.text: I do not have sensitive gums but after using this for a few days, I got an inflamed mouth with a burning feeling on the roof of my mouth and most of my gums. These areas are “sloughing” according to my dentist and very white. I am now using pain relieving cream just so I can eat and talk. Please proceed with caution and read all of the reviews before buying.
customer_reviews.author: aleem

customer_reviews.title: BIG NO NO
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it and not only it doesn't work, my teeth are the same color, plus the taste is very bitter. I don't know were all these reviews come from. Honestly I found this toothpaste through an article that sponsors a bunch of stuff on Amazon, I start to think it's a kind of scam. I will try to return it because I am not happy with it plus it is not approved by the American dental Association
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toothpaste thinking it would be a healthier way to whiten my teeth. I have normal discoloration from coffee and soda but overall good looking teeth. The first time I used it I was disgusted by the mess this black toothpaste makes. The mint flavor is not very strong so at the end you feel like you didn’t brush enough. It’s been almost a month now and I see no change in color of my teeth. In fact the only thing I have noticed is that my teeth are now sensitive and I can no longer eat sweets. Prior to using this toothpaste I did not have and sensitivity. I do not recommend this toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: Problem Number 1: There is NO expiration date... Problem Number 2: It does NOT have a strong mint taste. It's literally like brushing with PASTE. I don't like walking away from brushing feeling like. I didn't brush. Disgusting. I'll stick with Periobrite...
customer_reviews.author: K. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've used charcoal powder before, but often id forget, and I feel like this toothpaste works even better. As someone with naturally yellowish teeth (despite always brushing 3-4 times a day), charcoal has been life changing for me. Other charcoal toothpastes haven't been as good. I would, however, use a regular toothpaste once a day as well because I don't think this toothpaste has fluoride in it (which protects enamel).
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Seems to do what it claims
customer_reviews.text: As some of the other reviews say, it doesn't taste like typical toothpaste, but after all, the primary ingredient is activated charcoal. I didn't buy it for the taste, I bought it hoping to see improvement in the colour of my teeth, and I have, It is whitening my teeth. I drink almost entirely dark drinks; coffee, iced tea, soda, so I'm constantly fighting stains. I've only had the paste for about a week, but am already seeing improvement, so I give it 5 stars, it seems to do what it claims, and I've had no adverse effects. I will still use traditional toothpaste as this doesn't contain fluoride, which I find beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mills

customer_reviews.title: Good place to start; doesn’t work for everyone
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking to try a charcoal product for teeth whitening, this is a good place to start because it is basically mess free, more convenient than a powder, and a good price. However, I will say this, I’ve tried many charcoal products for teeth whitening, and I’ve come to the conclusion that charcoal does not work for everyone. I’ve seen others get great results from charcoal and it just never really does anything for me. As I said, this is a good place to start for anyone seeking the natural whitening route, but just be aware that it does not work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste great but watery consistency
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste taste amazing and it really does whiten your teeth after a few usages. However, my main concern is that this toothpaste is not paste like. It is watery and you really have to load your toothbrush up with this stuff to get it to spread around your mouth. I am not a fan of regular toothpaste's thick paste texture, but this stuff instantly turns into liquid once you start brushing. I want something that I have to work in and can feel the texture. 3 stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tysha Long

customer_reviews.title: Not Effective
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using this for a week now. Product is dry and melts easily. I can't feel the flavor or the product working. Had to brush with a different toothpaste to make my breath feel fresh
customer_reviews.author: Mechanichix

customer_reviews.title: No Noteable Difference and Doesn't Help With Bad Breath
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a bad toothpaste, but I did not get the teeth whitening others have claimed. I used it as instructed for a month but quickly switched back to using Pronamel. It whitens my teeth about as much as Pronamel does (which isn't much), but this toothpaste doesn't keep my breath minty fresh. It makes my breath smell minty for the first hour and quickly wears off. It actually makes my breath pretty foul once the mintiness wears off. This doesn't happen to me when I use Pronamel. I'm happy it works for others, but it doesn't work for me. I'll use the rest of the tube up but won't be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Grace Pham

customer_reviews.title: NO!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! DO NOT buy!!! This is the worst tasting toothpaste I have ever tried. Tastes like gasoline or kerosene would taste if ingested. Did anyone in manufacturing taste it? Thinking of returning it if at all possible.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: Gross!!!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a mess when brushing your teeth, spitting it out. To top it off, teeth do not feel clean! Do NOT waste your money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CinnGirl

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: Just used it this morning. I gotta say I did notice a difference after just one use. I'm not a paid reviewer. My teeth were in pretty good shape(white) to begin with yet after using this I noticed a quarter to a half shade improvement. Product didnt taste bad at all. Makes a little bit of a mess but nothing that cant be cleaned up in 5 seconds. It's seems to be legit. 4 stars because I've only used it once.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: I like the toothpaste. It works well for whitening and does not taste too terrible. However, there were two aspects that I did not appreciate: first, the consistency of the toothpaste is more watery and it often took two pea-sized applications to get through one brushing. Second, it discolored everything and stained both the electric toothbrush heads and handles. As a result, I would recommend using a disposable toothbrush as the stains are permanent after a few uses (even with cleaning).
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Whiter teeth in days!
customer_reviews.text: I use charcoal for all sorts of things and thought why not try it as toothpaste. I had recently started using a great natural toothpaste I got here on Amazon and decided to add this to the mix.I think it has made my teeth even whiter. I use a dab with my other toothpaste. This I think is better than straight black charcoal paste.My teeth are whiter than they have been in years and I had hem professionally whitened several years ago and they are whiter than then. Don't put those harsh chemicals on your teeth! Go natural!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a complete waste of money. It does not whiten your teeth. I used this product for two weeks as directed and there was absolutely no change. The toothpaste has a subtle mint flavor but kind of also tastes like rubber and because it is charcoal it stains everything. Since I ordered this product BBC news has come out with a study finding that charcoal toothpaste does not whiten your teeth at all, I wish I had seen that before I spent $11 on a tube of toothpaste.
customer_reviews.author: ryan rossetto

customer_reviews.title: Maybe as a Whitening Treatment, but not Exclusively
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this toothpaste every day for about two months now. I'm not sure if I've noticed a difference in the whiteness of my teeth. It does make my teeth feel clean, but sometimes the abrasiveness of the charcoal can make my teeth feel sensitive even more. Also, one should probably get the peppermint-flavored variety if they want to buy this product. I feel very insecure sometimes because even when I use a lot a brush multiple times, I can en up with bad breath out of no where. You can use this as a whitening treatment, but be aware of what the consequences are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ugh!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say about this products whitening ability. But the taste is absolutely awful! I taste like peppermint flavored mud. Yuck! I don't think I can tolerate it no matter when it may do for one's teeth.
customer_reviews.author: beterthanever

customer_reviews.title: Earthy Taste, Hard to Squeeze, No Results
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing this product wasted my time and money. I ended up returning it for a full refund. The taste was disgusting. It tasted like I was brushing my teeth with soil. Very earthy taste. It did no whitening whatsoever. I tried this toothpaste for about two weeks before I realized that I couldn’t take it anymore. My mouth didn’t feel clean afterwards. I ended up using regular toothpaste to make sure I had a thorough clean. It was also extremely hard to squeeze the toothpaste out of the tube. Don’t waste your time trying this product. I’m not sure where all of these 5 star reviews are coming from.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: It’s like brushing with mouthwash when you forget your toothpaste. No matter how much of this stuff I put on my toothbrush it never lathered at all. It just turned to black water. Saw little to no difference in the color of my teeth. Not worth my money
customer_reviews.author: Taylorchristen7

customer_reviews.title: Light gentle toothpaste with whiting
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used charcoal toothpaste before and it was really strong, broke down the enamel on my teeth and made them sensitive so I only used it like once a month. I decided to give this a try because of the coconut oil. It’s lighter than the old one I used to use. I’ve been using this every three days and so far I have noticed a difference in the whiteness. I am a person who brushes their teeth right after tea or coffee so that might help as well. I’d definitely recommend if you’re looking for something light on the tooth and natural.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s working! Been using for about two weeks. It’s taken longer to get tea stains between teeth off but it’s doing it. Also, cleaning behind front top and bottom teeth as I can see through them now. Heads up! Very hard to squeeze out for my arthritic hands but maybe not for everyone. No foaming like other toothpastes so may not feel like it is cleaning your teeth but it certainly is!
customer_reviews.author: coralee seifert

customer_reviews.title: Love It, Natural white.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I have tried tons of bleaches. They do a poor job, take forever, and leave my teeth sensitive. This stuff works. My teeth are noticeably whiter after a single use. I will say that they are a natural white and not glowing white like the bleaches can get them. I prefer this appearance. A huge plus is that it happens while brushing your teeth as you always do. No additional time with bleach trays in your mouth.
customer_reviews.author: ETGary

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how others had so much success with this product in such a short period of time. I've been using the toothpaste consistently twice a day for two weeks and have not noticed that my teeth have gotten any whiter. I drink one small cup of coffee in the morning and haven't had any red wine either. I might give it another week to see but this product seems like a no for me.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Tee

customer_reviews.title: Only Okay
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews before I bought this product, and a lot of them saw improvements after the first use. They even had pictures to prove it. I did not have that at all. I've been using it consistently for a week with no results. It does not taste as good as what people made it sound. I really do not think I will keep using this.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Frey

customer_reviews.title: Just WOW!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the glowing reviews of this toothpaste I wanted to give it a try as I make my own toothpaste with coconut oil, baking soda and turmeric which does great keeping my teeth and gums healthy but not so much whiter. I was very impressed with the immediate results of this toothpaste. Right after using it for the first time there was a big difference in the appearance of my teeth the same as that of just having had my teeth cleaned at the dentist and they just keep getting whiter! I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne O.

customer_reviews.title: Not messy like loose charcoal powder
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this paste for teeth whitening since I drink lots of coffee and tea. The charcoal capsules are a nightmare to open without getting everywhere! This paste is so much more convenient, but you'll still need to be careful when you spit! It seems to have whitened and is keeping my teeth whiter. Not a blinding white, but that's OK since that's not natural! I'm happy with the results and will reorder when needed :-)
customer_reviews.author: cincnan

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by one of the youtube Guru that I always watch mostly with health tips like teeth, beauty etc. The flavor wasn't too bad at all, after using it gives you that fresh breath smell. The results was really slow didn't see any changes in a month. It was more likely around close to two months but I was expecting more like white brighter teeth results. Took off some stains but wasn't really satisfying results.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie D.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible!
customer_reviews.text: For those of you who've commented on how good the flavor is, I'm not sure what you're used to! This stuff tastes disgusting! I had to re brush my teeth with regular toothpaste because the aftertaste was so bad. I wanted to love it, I really did! I already have charcoal toothbrushes and I've heard great things about charcoal toothpaste, but I can't use it without gagging so I cannot speak on the whitening aspect because I didn't use it long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Franki

customer_reviews.title: Good whitening effect, but there is potential for some side effects
customer_reviews.text: I’ve noticed that this causes some sensitivity after using it too many days in a row, so I use it just once or twice a week instead to maintain the whitening effect without experiencing the sensitivity from it. My bf tried this toothpaste and it made his lips swell, so if you get allergies to a lot of things then this might not be for you.
customer_reviews.author: roth0332

customer_reviews.title: burns gums & awful taste
customer_reviews.text: for one it BURNED my gums, hurt really bad. also the taste and smell is awful especially if you don’t like tea tree oil, i had lice a lot as a kid and so it’s especially traumatizing, i expected little taste and got a mouth full of gross. i tried it twice and it burned both times, would not reccommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, whitens the teeth
customer_reviews.text: Black toothpaste. Works fine ,whitens the teeth ,tastes minty. When you rinse out ,it comes out grey. Strang at first but it works, tastes fine and does what it says. I figure the less chemicals i put in my body the better off i am in the long run. This product fits the bill . Unlike other natural products that leave your teeth yellow, this one actually whitens them. That’s a home run for me. I recommend this toothpaste and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: downdawgy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So to say the least I did a difference I wanted to give it sometime before I reviewed and here are my thoughts so far. I did see an immediate difference however I feel like if u don’t continue to use or switch back to your normal toothpaste it doesn’t last. In terms of flavor I would say very bland I’ve had normal toothpaste make me gag worse than this. I’m not sure if this is the replacement to getting your teeth whitened but it definitely does help. Better than some of the teeth whitening toothpaste so far no complaints other than it’s kinda hard to squeeze out the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Takes a minute to get used to color
customer_reviews.text: This is black toothpaste. It does make a little mess in your sink because it does stay black. However it rinses away fine. I guess our regular toothpaste makes the same mess, but we cannot see it. The taste is not overpowering and it doesn’t feel gritty. It does leave a slight gray color on your electric toothbrush, so you will need to rinse your brush more thoroughly than with regular paste. My teeth feel and look cleaner but I am not sure about whiter.
customer_reviews.author: G. Small

customer_reviews.title: I love this toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: I recently ran out of my charcoal toothpaste and had to use the regular kind. I could absolutely tell the difference! My teeth feel SO much cleaner with the charcoal. There is no comparison. I will add that my dentist noticed how clean my teeth were, but they recommended using charcoal toothpaste intermittently as it is more abrasive than regular toothpaste. I took away one star because the tube is made of a very thick plastic and it gets increasingly difficult to get the product out once it starts running low. A minor issue overall but still annoying. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: BEST toothpaste I have ever used for gums and teeth. I love this skirt so much I ordered another.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several other toothpastes with charcoal. The others were too harsh and I had to stop using them. When I ordered this one my gums were very sore and tender. I ordered this because of the combination of coconut oil and charcoal. After only one use I could feel a soothing and healing going on in my mouth. After a few days my gums feel like they have been almost completely healed. No more soreness and my teeth are looking so much whiter. I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Immediate results
customer_reviews.text: Immediate results. Pleasant flavor of mint. Whiteness been increasing with continued use. Milder mint than mass marketed fluoride pastes. I like the mild flavor. I use mild mouthwashes as well for a non-shocking, just cleaning start and end to the day. Still do a deep clean with traditional paste periodically more for the scrubbed feel than the results.
customer_reviews.author: Plummy

customer_reviews.title: Red and irritated gums after using
customer_reviews.text: I used this product 3x and my gums got red and irritated. It seems my gums did not like the ingredients. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps mouth fresher longer.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans good and leaves breath fresher longer than regular tooth past. The tube does not dispense enough so I use a little more than just what comes out. It polishes teeth and leaves it smooth and clean feeling. Brush for 30 seconds to a minute. I did't find it to whiting teeth but my teeth are naturally not white so I would suggest using baking soda and peroxide along with this for whiter teeth. It's a good product and I will definitely not use anything else from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Bishnu Etwaru

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.text: Reluctant to try but did. The taste is tolerable if the product worked, but it is a total waste of money. I was looking for a more natural paste that also whitened instead of Crest. This didn’t do it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: From Yellow to White within 2 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: I drink a lot of coffee and occasionally some tea. I literally quit smiling (showing teeth) years ago because my teeth were so yellow. Half of a front tooth is false and it was even darker than the rest. I noticed a difference within days of using this toothpaste. However, after 2 weeks of use, I'm sold. Now my mother is a dental professor and she warned that charcoal is very abrasive on teeth. Heeding her warning, my plan is to use it for the month and switch back to normal toothpaste. If you want to save a ton of money over the expensive teeth whitening treatments out there, go this route. Just use caution.
customer_reviews.author: bevansciw

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my mouth feeling fresh and clean!!
customer_reviews.text: This is different to get used to, but I like it. It doesn't have the same consistency as 'regular' toothpaste and it is a little disconcerting to see black on the teeth. It's also noticeable in the sink, but it's simply black instead of white 'specks'. I really do like the taste and the way my mouth feels after using this toothpaste. The only thing that I don't like is the fact that it is more difficult to get out of the tube than regular toothpaste but that's because the consistency is different than regular toothpaste as well. I'll get used to that because I like it better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for those with with sensitive gums.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to help whiten my teeth, which are stained from years of drinking coffee, cola and tea. I cannot use white strips or regular whitening paste because of sensitivity issues. I did not expect “pearly whites” but hoped I would see some positive effect, which I did. I was pleasantly surprised that the toothpaste was not a bad experience as far as taste/texture. It actually left a clean, refreshing taste in my mouth. And it didn’t leave black stains all over my sink as some people have said about charcoal toothpaste in general. I will be switching to this paste for all my oral hygiene needs.
customer_reviews.author: $Saver

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: So, I was really excited to receive this! I took a before picture and started brushing! It’s been a whole week and no results. I will keep you posted. Not a super fresh mint either, pretty mediocre subtle minty. If your into that perfect but I like a really fresh minty mouth! I did use this with an electric toothbrush and my idiot self kept it on when rinsing it, splashed black everywhere lol
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Needs time to work
customer_reviews.text: The jury is still out as my husband has just started using the product and he might need a second tube in order to see results. I believe it removed some plaque from my teeth. Hard to tell if it's whitening because I have piano-key colored ivories that are not going to turn absolutely white. Need to use a goodly amount or it feels like you are brushing with water. Still adjusting to black spit.
customer_reviews.author: Maeshawn

customer_reviews.title: Not a good flavor
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I didn't have a chance to discover if this toothpaste actually whitens or not, as I was pretty grossed out right away with the taste. I know it's a charcoal toothpaste, so I wasn't expecting it to be as fresh and minty as a fluoride toothpaste, but this was straight up nasty. I felt like a kid eating dirt, it was pretty bad. As for the minty taste, it was almost nonexistent. Nastiest toothpaste I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Kate R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - and it works!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Finevine's charcoal and coconut whitening toothpaste for months now in addition to my usual toothpaste and I love it! I use it a few times a week and it has helped gently whiten my teeth even more then my other whitening toothpaste alone. I've never experienced gum sensitivity with this product - it has a neutral, mild, slightly minty taste and is not overly gritty or at all unpleasant. MUCH easier and neater to use than the jar of powdered charcoal I'd previously tried so I find myself using it regularly. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: C. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work...I feel like my teeth may actually be a bit darker than when I first started using this toothpaste. Also, this toothpaste doesn’t foam like regular toothpaste, and it can be a bit messy.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using charcoal toothpaste a little over 3 months and I am very satisfied with the results I get. My teeth get stained very easily from sweet drinks (coffee, tea, soda), and I was skeptical about charcoal toothpaste and wasn't sure it would work. It work in 2 tries. My teeth are pure white and I am never going back to regular toothpaste again. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle Skarsgård

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: Once you get past the ick factor of black toothpaste, the taste & clean feeling in you mouth takes over. Your teeth feel slick like you just came from your 6 mos. cleaning from the dental hygienist. Seriously. Do you have a mess in your sink? Well yeah, but your teeth get whiter & whiter every time you use this toothpaste. If you drink coffee, tea, red wine &/or other staining liquids or foods this is what you want to brush your teeth with. It also keeps your breath fresh for most of the day!
customer_reviews.author: Rad

customer_reviews.title: Great product, crappy paste packaging
customer_reviews.text: PROS: I noticed a very slight whitening effect after about a month. My tongue needs less frequent scraping. Great breath. Made in USA. CONS: the tube itself is a stiff plastic that requires hard squeezes to dispense the paste. After a few times of this, the crimped tube end burst open. I had to attach a strong office clip to the crimped end, and even that barely works. The packaging needs a lot of work. But, I would still buy this product again because of the good effects on my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Nico L.

customer_reviews.title: Every time I brush I feel like I just got a profession tooth cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using it a few days but I will say that my teeth feel soooo clean! Every time I brush I feel like I just got a profession tooth cleaning. The taste and texture takes a little adjusting too and I think my teeth may be a bit whiter. Not sure yet but I know I love the simple clean ingredients and squeaky clean mouth feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rose Stahl

customer_reviews.title: Well.. It's good but I'm checking it out
customer_reviews.text: Since I started using it, I noticed this white residue, like plaque, in the sides of my mouth. However after brushing hard it all came off, so it's either the toothpaste or the toothpaste is washing away a LOT of plaque and it's just left over. So I THINK this toothpaste is helping to REALLY clean my teeth. It tastes fine, and it's cool brushing your teeth with black stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Not as dramatic as others say but the product definitely works. 17 days in, I’m happy with the results. ** A wise suggestion would be to take a photo before you start the product. I really didn’t think my teeth were any whiter until I compared results. ** Unlike other reviews, there was absolutely NO CHANGE after brushing 3 times. The product does contain Xylitol so if you’re allergic, be wary. Be sure to keep out of reach of dogs.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Whitens cleans great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for cleaning and whitening your teeth. Does what it says. The only drawback is that you must fit into a cup and then dispose of it down the sink or you will be faced with a dark blackish residue in your sink. Other than that it is a far superior product then any I've tried and certainly more convenient than the charcoal powder that people have used.
customer_reviews.author: BarbiRN

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Was not expecting to have sparkling white teeth with this product, was really not expecting a whole lot. I have notice my teeth are a few shades whiter. The real surprise was the flavor, it did take a little of getting used too. The flavor is great it is not sweet like other toothpaste, making it hard to go back to the others as now they seem to be extremely sweet. The other surprise was how clean your teeth feel after brushing with it. Wife and I would not go back to any others.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: No big deal
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have been using this toothpaste and while I see some difference, it’s just not enough to get excited about for either of us. It’s not really meant to clean your teeth so it feels gross, doesn’t “lather” well in your mouth and doesn’t leave a fresh feeling so you feel the need to also brush your teeth with normal toothpaste. While I like the natural ingredients and know this charcoal stuff is the “latest thing”. I just assume use crest white strips. Better results.
customer_reviews.author: J. Geyer

customer_reviews.title: My teeth seem whiter in two weeks~
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving the toothpaste so far! It has been a little over two weeks and I do notice a small difference as far as them being whiter, which is nice! The taste isn't the greatest, but it's not unbearable by any stretch. My teeth are pretty sensitive and this has also seemed to help with that, or my last toothpaste could have been making it worse. Overall, I'm pleased. I was hesitant based on price, but it seems to be worth it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Zukowski

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste does what it advertises. My teeth were notably whiter after just one use and the improvement has continued over the past week of use. Although the black color was a bit off-putting, it tastes good (I chose the spearmint flavor) and dispenses easily from the tube. I have a sensitive mouth and I haven't had any problems with peeling of tissue in my mouth or sensitivity with my teeth. I would highly recommend this toothpaste to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: RDG

customer_reviews.title: So Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Received this product so quickly! The packaging is top-notch, and the product seems to be working very well. I've only had it for a week, but so far, I really like it! The taste is great - love it! The only slight adjustment I had to make was getting used to using black toothpaste! It only took a day or two to get with the program, though, and I am really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: hours of enjoyment...keeps me on my toes.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the worst toothpaste I’ve ever tried. Seriously terrible. I would tell anyone thinking about buying this stuff to take a look in the mirror and ask yourself do you really feeling like throwing away money on this half baked product? If that answer is yes then by all means buy this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about this product because of the many positive reviews I read about it. Unfortunately, I haven't had any success with this toothpaste. I don't see anything special about it. It is just like regular toothpaste except it can be messy. I haven't seen a difference in the feel or whiteness of my teeth. I bought one for my mom also and she also doesn't like it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Nicole Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Can tell a difference but not drastic
customer_reviews.text: I researched toothpaste I could use for whitening while pregnant and found this one. The flavor is good and I can tell a difference in my teeth after a few weeks. I will say the difference isn’t as dramatic as some of these before and after pictures. However, it does help and has a good taste so I’ll continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Gently, subtle whitening.
customer_reviews.text: The photo attached has most recent teeth on top. 3 weeks apart. I am very pleased with the product. I have used no strips or other whitening. I think the taste is very pleasant and the charcoal just takes getting used to. I do use a Phillip's sonicare and have since Christmas. Mostly twice daily brushing, but sometimes just AM. I have used whitening products in the past and dont anyone due to enamel wear. So I am very happy that this actually works without increased sensitivity
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Scott

customer_reviews.title: It sure is toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's because of the charcoal or because I'm brushing my teeth twice a day, but my teeth are definitely getting a little lighter. Theyve been stained yellow for YEARS, so i'm pleasantly surprised that this is working at all. Its less concentrated than other charcoal toothpastes on the market and doesnt foam very much, and you have to use quite a bit at one time for it to cover all your teeth. Its flavor is very mild, which is nice. I will likely be buying this again!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: I love this toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothpaste! It leaves my mouth feeling super fresh, almost like my teeth were just professionally cleaned. I love that it is all natural without all the chemicals and unpronouncable ingredients. It arrived right on time and exceeded my expectations. I will definitely order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Bell

customer_reviews.title: eh...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen a difference. Taste is fine for me. You have to clean the sink each time (who knew spit went so farspread? germs people, reminder to cover your mouth when you sneeze!). And if I use at night, my teeth usually wake up feeling not very clean. But I have seen zero difference in whitening. Perhaps I am using it wrong. I only use it in the morning. I use my regular paste at night.
customer_reviews.author: americangirl

customer_reviews.title: It DEFINITELY Whitens But...
customer_reviews.text: Please read ENTIRE review... this is NOT ordinary toothpaste. It’s black, gritty & the mint taste is weak. It definitely does not taste/feel/react like regular toothpaste & absolutely takes getting used to HOWEVER, I purchased it for its “whitening” capabilities & after only three days, I see a marked difference in my teeth. I drink coffee & tried the commercial brands with little results. As the package suggests “use for “thirty days” & see. I am anxiously awaiting the results. As of this review, I would recommend & repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: The word "charcoal" in the name should have clued us in, but this stuff is black--black toothpaste!! It looks so gross when you are brushing your teeth that we can't get over it. Plus, the spearmint taste is very mild and it doesn't feel like it really freshens the breath. We will use up this tube but won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of Two

customer_reviews.title: Good Maintenance, does not whiten.
customer_reviews.text: I think that it's been somewhat whitening my teeth. They weren't very discolored to begin with but some of the before and afters seemed great so I thought I'd give it a try. It's been a while since I'm using it and I don't really see very noticeable results. This might be good for maintaining a white smile, just won't give you a white smile. I took a star off for two things, first is taste, it smells/tastes like pine-y not minty and second you have to use quite a lot of product.
customer_reviews.author: ABC1 Amazons Best Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works, but irritates my gums
customer_reviews.text: I only use this about once a week since it irritates my gums. It does do a good job with whitening and cleaning, though. Also I’d imagine it’s a lot less messy than getting a charcoal powder to use for the same purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Lissenden

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the most annoying toothpaste ever. It tastes fine, whitens very slightly, but.. If you want black gunk ALL over your friggen sink, BY ALL MEANS this is the tube for you! If you enjoy a clean bathroom and toothpaste that actually rinses like normal and doesn't stick like resin from a bong, get "hello" brand. I'm a bit of a natural toothpaste connoisseur and this is probably the worst of all that I've tried, in terms of practicality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I buy this toothpaste. I like it because it whitens a little the teeth, although it is not immediate, I observe that my teeth look a little whiter after using a complete tube. Also, I have sensitive teeth, because I have lost a little of the enamel to wash them too much and this paste helps me not to disturb my teeth. I like its taste and it is easy to wash the sink with black spots that it leaves after rinsing the mouth.
customer_reviews.author: M. Molina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: tastes great and makes your teeth feel clean and snmooth
customer_reviews.author: SONIA ALONSO

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: i have been using this twice a day for only a few days and wow! I can already tell a difference. My teeth have been stained from coffee & tea ( just can't give them up ) I can't wait to see what the results will be in a few more weeks! I've tried using charcoal capsules and omg what a mess!! this is so much better and not to mention taste is so much more pleasant. I highly recommend this for anyone who can't afford a trip to the dentist for whitening which causes pain in my experience, I will do another review after using this product for 30 days. Thanks Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the whirl
customer_reviews.text: I like it, I felt like it whitened in two uses. Like a shade or maybe two. Which is what I wanted, so far only used 10xs. But I can say when I stopped it seems like it went back to same color. Flavor was great, grey mess in sink was a bit shocking but makes sense since it’s charcoal. I can’t compare it to any others since this is the first I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Clancy Wiggum

customer_reviews.title: Takes some getting use to
customer_reviews.text: So the flavor takes some getting use to, and once use to it, it still isnt a good flavor. I didnt see a change in the whitening of my teeth eather.. with that said, I do feel like it cleans well. I also really like that it is fluoride free. For those that are curious though, I wont buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother spending
customer_reviews.text: This product is messy, tastes like gas, and does not work. When you brush, black toothpaste splashes all over and makes a mess. They added some gloss to make it look like it does something.
customer_reviews.author: Armin

customer_reviews.title: Damages Gums
customer_reviews.text: I am simply going to say that over time this will damage your gums. I am not a person sensitive to toothpaste, whitening strips or loose charcoal. Please don't buy this product. I am not sure the reviews giving it 5 stars is real. You will be ok for a few wks and then you will notice some sensitivity. At least if you are considering buying it, please speak to your dentist first. I learned the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Inna I.

customer_reviews.title: The first time I used i did see a difference which was noticeable in my eyes and my opinion but it seemed like the next day after using it or after brushing ...
customer_reviews.text: It was okay i haven't used it regularly being everyday as directed. The first time I used i did see a difference which was noticeable in my eyes and my opinion but it seemed like the next day after using it or after brushing the whiteness wasn't as noticeable. But again I have not used it regularly which I am sure if I did then the results would last longer. I am happy with the taste and I am glad that it is a paste and not powder.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Good for whitening if you can get over the taste
customer_reviews.text: I use this product every day and I like it, but I think it could be better. The whitening quality is my favorite part of it. It is the main reason I still use this toothpaste. I have seen a good difference over the past month, and close friends have too. However, the taste of this toothpaste is not my favorite, at all. It takes similar to dirt honestly. I do not like it at all, and I hate brushing my tongue with it. Therefore I feel like it doesn’t make my breath smell as good as other mint toothpaste. But, it does leave a clean feeling if you brush your teeth with pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Holley

customer_reviews.title: Works Well not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I like that this product is made in the USA. The flavor is good, the whitening is as good as expected, for me, it wouldn't whiten my teeth like getting it done professionally, but I didn't expect it to being a coffee drinker. It's a lot thicker than the other brands I've used so sometimes it was difficult getting it out of the tube. Works well to freshen breath. Cons: Price point is a little high so I probably wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be working as far as my breath is concerned. Too soon to evaluate the whitening, but ask me in a month or two. It is a little messy, but I put my electric tooth brush in my mouth and close it, before turning it on. and that helps a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Norsegirl

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy with the results thus far
customer_reviews.text: This product is really incredible! I am so happy with the results thus far. I brush twice a day, along with mouth wash. I would recommend this product to anyone 😁
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fiedler

customer_reviews.title: Tastes horrible
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be spearmint flavored, but all I taste is strong tea tree oil, which is a disgusting flavor. Also carbon works best for whitening when rubbed dry onto teeth with a finger. This toothpaste doesn't actually whiten. Adding some carbon to a product doesn't make it a magical potion. I regret wasting my money.
customer_reviews.author: shopper489

customer_reviews.title: Possible allergic reactions!
customer_reviews.text: I normally never write a review. I personally would give it zero stars. I really disliked this product due to having allergic reaction to this toothpaste that started Thursday when I received it and now its Monday and my tongue is still hurting as well as not being able to taste anything.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by Women’s Day magazine
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I saw a recommendation in Woman’s Day magazine saying this was the best product to whiten teeth. Really works. I can tell a difference already. Can’t wait to see what my teeth will look like in a month. Which they say you receive optimum results. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: nancy bailey

product_meta.title: 100% Natural Charcoal Teeth Whitening Toothpaste| Charcoal Toothpaste Made in USA| Acti-vated Charcoal Toothpaste for Healthy Gums & Pearly Whites| Organic Vegan Coconut Char-coal Toothpaste Whitening
feature_bullets: ✅ WHITEN YOUR TEETH NATURALLY by choosing the FineVine premium charcoal teeth whitening toothpaste, which contains organic activated coconut charcoal, Xylitol and peppermint oil. Now you can finally start smiling with confidence again and effectively remove harmful bacteria, coffee, wine, cigarette or tea stains from your sensitive teeth.

✅ LET OUR ANTISEPTIC & REMINERALIZING INGREDIENTS DO ALL THE HARD WORK! The FineVine exclusive all natural and vegan teeth whitening tooth paste contains active ingredients such as Baking Soda, Diatomaceous Earth, Tea Tree Oil, Coconut Oil, Xylitol and Peppermint Oil, which will effectively detox and cleanse your mouth. Plus, we have made sure that our natural formula is SLS free, Peroxide-free, Gluten-free and Parabens-free.

✅ STRENGTHEN YOUR SENSITIVE TEETH & PROTECT YOUR GUMS NATURALLY thanks to our dentist recommended activated charcoal toothpaste, which is more efficient and healthier than other tooth whiteners, such as messy charcoal powders, strips, gels or light pens. Rest assured that our black charcoal whitening toothpaste will not remove enamel from your teeth and will promote gum health. SAFE FOR KIDS

✅ FRESHEN UP YOUR BAD BREATH & REGAIN YOUR LOST CONFIDENCE with our carbon charcoal toothpaste for sensitive teeth. Our refreshing mint-flavored coconut toothpaste will help eliminate bacteria from your mouth, thus offering you a minty-fresh breath that lasts for hours. Now your mouth will feel fresh and cleansed for longer thanks to our fluoride free charcoal toothpaste.

✅ 100% HEALTHIER, STRONGER & WHITER TEETH OR YOUR MONEY BACK! That’s our unconditional peace-of-mind guarantee! We believe in honest smiles and that’s exactly why we back our dentist approved charcoal teeth toothpaste with our full refund guarantee! If you are not 100% thrilled with your mess-free and refreshing natural coconut charcoal toothpaste, we will offer you a full refund. No questions asked!
